description.value:
You create an area of bright light. Creatures with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.Light Blindness] that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] by radiant field and remain in the area must attempt a Fortitude save at the start of their turns. On a failure, a creature remains blinded for 1 round; this is an incapacitation effect.

This spell also suppresses magical darkness of your radiant field spell's rank or lower.

Heightened (4th) Creatures seen through the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] to creatures outside the area. Creatures with light blindness can continue to be blinded by the field as long as the field is visible, even when outside of the field.
